name: POST_live-streams-liveStreamId-thumbnail
description: Upload an image to use as a backdrop for your livestream. Tutorials that [update live stream thumbnails](https://api.video/blog/endpoints/live-upload-a-thumbnail).

liveStreamId.description: The unique ID for the live stream you want to upload.

file.description: The image to be added as a thumbnail.

$ul: **assets**
**hls**: The http live streaming (HLS) link for your live video stream.
**iframe**: The embed code for the iframe containing your live video stream.
**player**: A link to the video player that is playing your live stream.
**thumbnail**: A link to the thumbnail for your video.
**broadcasting**: Whether or not you are broadcasting the live video you recorded for others to see. True means you are broadcasting to viewers, false means you are not.
**liveStreamId**: The unique identifier for the live stream. Live stream IDs begin with "li."
**name**: The name of your live stream.
**playerId**: The unique identifier for the player.

**public**: BETA FEATURE Please limit all public = false ("private") livestreams to 3,000 users. Whether your video can be viewed by everyone, or requires authentication to see it. A setting of false will require a unique token for each view.
**record**: Whether you are recording or not.
**streamKey**: The unique, private stream key that you use to begin streaming.
